name: R5-QuestionnaireResponseStatus-R4-QuestionnaireResponseStatus
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 QuestionnaireResponseStatus into FHIR R4

element.display: This QuestionnaireResponse has been filled out with answers, then marked as complete, yet changes or additions have been made to it afterwards.

target.display: This QuestionnaireResponse has been filled out with answers, then marked as complete, yet changes or additions have been made to it afterwards.

element.display: This QuestionnaireResponse has been filled out with answers and the current content is regarded as definitive.

target.display: This QuestionnaireResponse has been filled out with answers and the current content is regarded as definitive.

element.display: This QuestionnaireResponse was entered in error and voided.

target.display: This QuestionnaireResponse was entered in error and voided.

element.display: This QuestionnaireResponse has been partially filled out with answers but changes or additions are still expected to be made to it.

target.display: This QuestionnaireResponse has been partially filled out with answers but changes or additions are still expected to be made to it.

element.display: This QuestionnaireResponse has been partially filled out with answers but has been abandoned. No subsequent changes can be made.

target.display: This QuestionnaireResponse has been partially filled out with answers but has been abandoned. It is unknown whether changes or additions are expected to be made to it.
